verses.verse: And <WG2532> he entered <WG1684> into <WG1519> a boat <WG4143>, and crossed over <WG1276>, and <WG2532> came <WG2064> into <WG1519> his own <WG2398> city <WG4172>.

And <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, they brought <WG4374> to him <WG846> a man sick of the palsy <WG3885>, lying <WG906> on <WG1909> a bed <WG2825>: and <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> seeing <WG1492> their <WG846> faith <WG4102> said <WG2036> unto the sick of the palsy <WG3885>, Son <WG5043>, be of good cheer <WG2293>; thy <WG4675> sins <WG266> are forgiven <WG863>.
And <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, certain <WG5100> of the scribes <WG1122> said <WG2036> within <WG1722> themselves <WG1438>, This <WG3778> man blasphemeth <WG987>.
And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> knowing <WG1492> their <WG846> thoughts <WG1761> said <WG2443>, Wherefore <WG2444> think <WG1760> ye <WG5210> evil <WG4190> in <WG1722> your <WG5216> hearts <WG2588>?
For <WG1063> which <WG5101> is <WG2076> easier <WG2123>, to say <WG2036>, Thy <WG5101> sins <WG266> are forgiven <WG863>; or <WG2228> to say <WG2036>, Arise <WG1453>, and <WG2532> walk <WG4043>?

But <WG1161> that <WG2443> ye may know <WG1492> that <WG3754> the Son <WG5207> of man <WG444> hath <WG2192> authority <WG1849> on <WG1909> earth <WG1093> to forgive <WG863> sins <WG266> (then <WG5119> saith he <WG3004> to the sick of the palsy <WG3885>), Arise <WG1453>, and take up <WG142> thy <WG4675> bed <WG2825>, and <WG2532> go <WG5217> up unto <WG1519> thy <WG4675> house <WG3624>.
And <WG2532> he arose <WG1453>, and departed <WG565> to <WG1519> his <WG846> house <WG3624>.

But <WG1161> when <WG1492> the multitudes <WG3793> saw <WG1492> it <WG2296>, they were afraid, and <WG2532> glorified <WG1392> God <WG2316>, who had given <WG1325> such <WG5108> authority <WG1849> unto men <WG444>.

And <WG2532> as <WG3855> Jesus <WG2424> passed by <WG3855> from thence <WG1564>, he saw <WG1492> a man <WG444>, called <WG3004> Matthew <WG3156>, sitting <WG2521> at <WG1909> the place of toll <WG5058>: and <WG2532> he saith <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Follow <WG190> me <WG3427>. And <WG2532> he arose <WG450>, and followed <WG190> him <WG846>.

And <WG2532> it came to pass <WG1096>, as <WG345> he <WG846> sat at meat <WG345> in <WG1722> the house <WG2532>, behold <WG2400>, many <WG4183> publicans <WG5057> and <WG2532> sinners <WG268> came and <WG2064> sat down with <WG4873> Jesus <WG2424> and <WG2532> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>.

And <WG2532> when <WG1492> the Pharisees <WG5330> saw <WG1492> it <WG2036>, they said unto <WG3101> his <WG846> disciples <WG1223>, Why <WG5101> eateth <WG2068> your <WG5216> Teacher <WG1320> with <WG3326> the publicans <WG5057> and <WG2532> sinners <WG268>?

But <WG1161> when <WG191> he <WG2424> heard <WG191> it <WG2036>, he said, They that are whole <WG2480> have <WG2192> no <WG3756> need <WG5532> of a physician <WG2395>, but <WG235> they that are sick <WG2192>.

But <WG1161> go ye and <WG4198> learn <WG3129> what <WG5101> this meaneth <WG2076>, I desire <WG2309> mercy <WG1656>, and <WG2532> not <WG3756> sacrifice <WG2378>, for <WG1063> I came <WG2064> not <WG3756> to call <WG2564> the righteous <WG1342>, but <WG235> sinners <WG268>.

Then <WG5119> come to <WG4334> him <WG846> the disciples <WG3101> of John <WG2491>, saying <WG1223>, Why <WG5101> do <WG3522> we <WG2249> and <WG2532> the Pharisees <WG5330> fast <WG3522> oft <WG4183>, but <WG1161> thy <WG4675> disciples <WG3101> fast <WG3522> not <WG3756>?

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> said <WG2036> unto them <WG3361>, Can <WG1410> the sons <WG5207> of the bridechamber <WG3567> mourn <WG3996>, as <WG1909> long as <WG3745> the bridegroom <WG3566> is <WG2076> with <WG3326> them <WG846>? but <WG1161> the days <WG2250> will come <WG2064>, when <WG3752> the bridegroom <WG3566> shall be taken <WG522> away from <WG575> them <WG846>, and <WG2532> then <WG5119> will they fast <WG3522>.

And <WG1161> no man <WG3762> putteth <WG1911> a <WG1161> piece <WG1915> of undressed <WG46> cloth <WG4470> upon an <WG2440> old <WG3820> garment <WG2440>; for <WG1063> that which should fill <WG4138> it <WG846> up <WG4138> taketh <WG142> from <WG575> the garment <WG2440>, and <WG2532> a worse <WG5501> rent <WG4978> is made <WG1096>.

Neither <WG3761> do men put <WG906> new <WG3501> wine <WG3631> into <WG1519> old <WG3820> wine-skins <WG779>: else <WG3361> the skins <WG779> burst <WG4486>, and <WG2532> the wine <WG3631> is spilled <WG1632>, and <WG2532> the skins <WG779> perish <WG622>: but <WG235> they put <WG906> new <WG2537> wine <WG3631> into <WG1519> fresh <WG2537> wine-skins <WG779>, and <WG2532> both <WG297> are preserved <WG4933>.

While <WG2980> he <WG846> spake <WG2980> these things <WG5023> unto them <WG846>, behold <WG2400>, there came <WG2064> a ruler <WG758>, and <WG2064> worshipped <WG4352> him <WG846>, saying <WG3754>, My <WG3450> daughter <WG2364> is <WG5053> even now <WG737> dead <WG5053>: but <WG235> come and <WG2064> lay <WG2007> thy <WG4675> hand <WG5495> upon <WG1909> her <WG846>, and <WG2532> she shall live <WG2198>.
And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> arose <WG1453>, and followed <WG190> him <WG846>, and <WG2532> so did his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>.

And <WG2532> behold <WG2400>, a woman <WG1135>, who had an issue of blood <WG131> twelve <WG1427> years <WG2094>, came <WG4334> behind <WG3693> him <WG680>, and touched the border <WG2899> of <WG2440> his <WG846> garment <WG2440>:
for <WG1063> she said <WG3004> within <WG1722> herself <WG1438>, If <WG1437> I do <WG680> but <WG3440> touch <WG680> his <WG846> garment <WG2440>, I shall be made whole <WG4982>.

But <WG1161> Jesus <WG2424> turning and <WG2532> seeing <WG1492> her <WG846> said <WG2036>, Daughter <WG2364>, be of good cheer <WG2293>; thy <WG4675> faith <WG4102> hath made <WG4982> thee <WG4571> whole <WG4982>. And <WG2532> the woman <WG1135> was made whole <WG4982> from <WG575> that <WG1565> hour <WG5610>.

And <WG2532> when <WG2064> Jesus <WG2424> came <WG2064> into <WG1519> the ruler <WG758>'s house <WG3614>, and <WG2532> saw <WG1492> the flute-players <WG834>, and <WG2532> the crowd <WG3793> making a tumult <WG2350>,

he said <WG3004>, Give place <WG402>: for <WG1063> the damsel <WG2877> is <WG599> not <WG3756> dead <WG599>, but <WG235> sleepeth <WG2518>. And <WG2532> they laughed <WG2606> him <WG846> to scorn <WG2606>.
But <WG1161> when <WG3753> the crowd <WG3793> was put forth <WG1544>, he entered in <WG1525>, and took <WG2902> her <WG846> by the hand <WG5495>; and <WG2532> the damsel <WG2877> arose <WG1453>.
And <WG2532> the fame <WG5345> hereof <WG3778> went forth <WG1831> into <WG1519> all <WG3650> that <WG1565> land <WG1093>.

And <WG2532> as <WG3855> Jesus <WG2424> passed <WG3855> by from thence <WG1564>, two <WG1417> blind men <WG5185> followed <WG190> him <WG846>, crying <WG2896> out <WG2532>, and saying <WG3004>, Have mercy on <WG1653> us <WG2248>, thou son <WG5207> of David <WG1138>.

And <WG1161> when he was come <WG2064> into <WG1519> the house <WG3614>, the blind men <WG5185> came <WG4334> to him <WG846>: and <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> saith <WG3004> unto them <WG846>, Believe ye <WG4100> that <WG3754> I am able <WG1410> to do <WG4160> this <WG5124>? They say <WG3004> unto him <WG846>, Yea <WG3483>, Lord <WG2962>.
Then <WG5119> touched he <WG680> their <WG846> eyes <WG3788>, saying <WG3004>, According to <WG2596> your <WG5213> faith <WG4102> be it <WG1096> done unto you <WG5213>.
And <WG2532> their <WG846> eyes <WG3788> were opened <WG455>. And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> strictly charged <WG1690> them <WG846>, saying <WG3004>, See <WG3708> that no man <WG3367> know it <WG1097>.
But <WG1161> they <WG3588> went forth <WG1310>, and spread abroad <WG1310> his <WG846> fame <WG1310> in <WG1722> all <WG3650> that <WG1565> land <WG1093>.
And as <WG1161> they <WG846> went forth <WG1831>, behold <WG2400>, there was brought <WG4374> to him <WG846> a dumb <WG2974> man <WG444> possessed with a demon <WG1139>.

And <WG2532> when <WG1544> the demon <WG1140> was cast out <WG1544>, the dumb <WG2974> man spake <WG2980>: and <WG2532> the multitudes <WG3793> marvelled <WG2296>, saying <WG3754>, It was <WG5316> never <WG3763> so <WG3779> seen <WG5316> in <WG1722> Israel <WG2474>.
But <WG1161> the Pharisees <WG5330> said <WG3004>, By <WG1722> the prince <WG758> of the demons <WG1140> casteth he out <WG1544> demons <WG1140>.

And <WG2532> Jesus <WG2424> went about <WG4013> all <WG3956> the cities <WG4172> and <WG2532> the villages <WG2968>, teaching <WG1321> in <WG1722> their <WG846> synagogues <WG4864>, and <WG2532> preaching <WG2784> the gospel <WG2098> of the kingdom <WG932>, and <WG2532> healing <WG2323> all manner <WG3956> of disease <WG3119> and <WG2532> all manner <WG3956> of sickness <WG3554>.

But <WG1161> when he saw <WG1492> the multitudes <WG3793>, he was moved with compassion <WG4697> for <WG4012> them <WG846>, because <WG3754> they <WG2258> were <WG2258> distressed <WG1590> and <WG2532> scattered <WG5616>, as sheep <WG4263> not <WG3361> having <WG2192> a shepherd <WG4166>.
Then <WG5119> saith he <WG3004> unto <WG3101> his <WG846> disciples <WG3101>, The harvest <WG2326> indeed <WG3303> is plenteous <WG4183>, but <WG1161> the laborers <WG2040> are few <WG3641>.
Pray ye <WG1189> therefore <WG3767> the Lord <WG2962> of the harvest <WG2326>, that <WG3704> he send forth <WG1544> laborers <WG2040> into <WG1519> his <WG846> harvest <WG2326>.
